mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.login_name,a.nickname,t.mobile,a.icon,t.birthyear,t.birthmonth,t.birthday,t.prov,t.gender,a.serialno FROM f_app_user a, f_tpad_user t WHERE a.tpad_id = t.id AND a.id = #{uid} and app_id=1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_app_user_third (id, qq, qq_nickname, qq_image_url, wx, wx_nickname, wx_image_url) VALUES(#{id},#{qq},#{qq_nickname},#{qq_image_url},#{wx},#{wx_nickname},#{wx_image_url})
mapper.update: update f_tpad_user set gender=#{gender}, birthday=#{birthday}, birthyear=#{birthyear}, birthmonth=#{birthmonth} where id=#{tpad_id}
UPDATE f_app_user set nickname=#{nickname} WHERE id=#{uid}
